channel.title: Dezible
channel.description: It is hard to focus - and there is lot to learn. Cybersecurity is a very broad field. Broader than what people might imagine. There is a lot of data/information out there. It takes time to transform that to knowledge. Sharing your learning progress can be an effective way to do it. My goal is to document and share my progress. Hopefully it helps you. What is next ? Soon, I will start adding content.
